biotools.summary: Open source visual analysis framework targeted at biomolecular data. The biggest strength of this software is the visualization of interdependencies between multiple datasets. It can load tabular data and groupings/clusterings. You can explore relationships between multiple groupings, between different datasets and see how your data maps onto pathways.

bioschemas.name: Caleydo
